price: Dhorgamaa! Yeroo dachiin waliin dhawamiinsa jabaa waliin dhawamte.
arabic: كَلَّآۖ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ دَكّٗا دَكّٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: kallā idhā dukkati al-arḍu dakkan dakkan
